Examples / Indicators

Subcategory: Routine inquiries or minor dissatisfaction with no direct threat to the bank.
User Signal / Context (Examples): General questions about branch hours, exchange rates, or simple feature requests.

Subcategory: Individual service issues or isolated technical bugs.
User Signal / Context (Examples): "I forgot my password," "The app is slow today," or complaints about a specific teller.

Subcategory: Serious financial or technical issues affecting trust or money.
User Signal / Context (Examples): Failed transactions, money missing from account, or allegations of fraud/scams.

Subcategory: Systemic threats that could cause mass panic or widespread failure.
User Signal / Context (Examples): App-wide outages, "Bank Run" calls (withdraw everything!), or confirmed security breaches.
